title: Banned
body: I am not sure why but I got banned today , I was playing support Elise , and like we lost that game then straight after I clicked continue a message pops up and it's telling me that my account have been banned until 11 of November, I'm not sure why but these are my reason I think I got banned 1. I played Elise supp ( not that it realy matters ) 2. I was talking a some trash , not a lot but just a bit towards my adc and I remember what I said , I quoted ' I think that there vayne is better then our vayne ' and another guy defended him ( cuz there duo , how I know ? Cuz there in the same team ) and he quoted' there sopport is a sopport ' then after that I stoped talking 3. And also I think it's from a few other games I had befor idk how the report system works but maybe cuz of a few other games , and just to state we had a {{champion:92}} mid and like that person afk'ed , ok after all this the message told me that it was exiting the application, it existed then I reopen it and tryed to log in and then it was like your account has been suspended u till 11 of November. And like I'm just not sure why I got banned sure I was a bit toicx but I haven seen any on get banned from that like what the hell I get banned for saying a few things towards my adc . There's people out there that swear the room up and I get banned ! . ,! This is messed up , I know I'm just 1 person out of millions of other league players but I just want an answer to why I was banned . They told me to check my gmail , I checked it and nothing came up so yeah what's up with that .  And also my friend to got banned he had a reason why he got hacked apparently and the hacker was trolling then he got banned then shorafter he messaged riot he got unbanned he says . I know this has nothing to do with my situation but I just wanted to put it out there . So why did my account ApolloBrahz get banned for please answer me

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should've received an email pertaining to your ban (Check your junk folder just incase), if for some reason you have not received this email or you are unable to find it then you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further details regarding your suspension.
